td.content: s:patient presents with 2 months history of Liver. pt is a 50 YO white M paralegal. Alcohol 1-4 beers/month he has approx. a 30 pack/year history of smoking o:Height 65 in, Weight 185 lbs, Temperature 98.4 F, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 15 a:Hepatitis B p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to internal medicine.

s:patient presents with Liver. he is having symptoms 12-13 times a week, in spite of treatment. patient is a 50 YO white M. patient reports that he smokes once or twice daily he reports having no more than one drink a day o:Height 65 in, Weight 186 lbs, Temperature 98.5 F, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16 a:Hepatitis B p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Liver biopsy-FNA Cyto.

content2.Unmatched: patient reports that he smokes once or twice daily he reports having no more than one drink a day

td.content: s:pt presents with moderate sudden onset of extreme anxiety, tremulousness and sweating immediately before public appearances and moderate feelings of apprehension when taking tests. he is a 51 yr old male paralegal. o:Height 65 in, Weight 186 lbs, Temperature 98.5 F, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16 a:Anxiety p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Buspirone - 15 mg /day, and ordered GAD - 7 Assessment Tool.

s:white male aged 52 Ys presents with Liver for about 4 days. o:Height 66 in, Weight 186 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 86, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 17, Liver biopsy-FNA Cyto Severe portal inflammation, lymphocytic bridging necrosis, and diffuse hepatocellular damage a:Hepatitis B p:administered Telbivudine - 600 mg once daily, performed Liver biopsy-FNA Cyto, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
